::????????/XXXXXXXX::
       A ship lurches out of an interdimensional wormhole near the planet 
Earth.  The hull is scored with battle damage.  As it skims by Earth's 
atmosphere it launches two pods at high speed towards the ground.  They crash 
mere inches apart, only meters from the Maximal base.  The pods instantly 
open and the occupants scramble out already in their prechosen beastmodes.  
They glare at each other quickly and the first bot transforms into his robot 
mode.  "What's the matter Enertron?  Too weak to transform?"  He draws two 
daggers and stands ready for a fight.

       Enertron grits his teeth and transforms in a flash of light.  The 
sound of his flesh ripping and reattaching is clearly audible.  "I'm never 
too weak for you Amperion."  He launches a quick blast at Amperion's head and 
flees toward the Maximal base.



--part1_10d.17bd47ba.2aad7890_boundary
Content-Type: text/html; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit

<HTML><FONT FACE=arial,helvetica><FONT  SIZE=2>::????????/XXXXXXXX::
<BR>       A ship lurches out of an interdimensional wormhole near the planet Earth.  The hull is scored with battle damage.  As it skims by Earth's atmosphere it launches two pods at high speed towards the ground.  They crash mere inches apart, only meters from the Maximal base.  The pods instantly open and the occupants scramble out already in their prechosen beastmodes.  They glare at each other quickly and the first bot transforms into his robot mode.  "What's the matter Enertron?  Too weak to transform?"  He draws two daggers and stands ready for a fight.
<BR>
<BR>       Enertron grits his teeth and transforms in a flash of light.  The sound of his flesh ripping and reattaching is clearly audible.  "I'm never too weak for you Amperion."  He launches a quick blast at Amperion's head and flees toward the Maximal base.
<BR>
